net.java.jddac.common.exception
Class OpException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          net.java.jddac.common.exception.OpException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class OpException
extends java.lang.Exception

This class represents the exceptions that can occur during a 1451.1 network transaction. It is currently unused in JDDAC. Instead, use the generic Exception class in Java.

See Also:

Constructor Summary
OpException()
          Creates an OpException instance with the major code set to COMPLETE
OpException(byte major, byte minor)
          Creates an OpException instance with the provided major and minor codes
OpException(java.lang.String msg)
          Creates an OpException instance with the major code set to COMPLETE, containing the supplied human readable message
OpException(java.lang.String msg, byte major, byte minor)
          Creates an OpException instance with the provided major and minor codes, as well as the given message for user.
